skinshuffle.reconnect.title: %s 필요
skinshuffle.reconnect.message:
바뀐 스킨을 다른 플레이어에게 표시하기 위해 %s이(가) 필요합니다.

%s에 %s을(를) 하시겠습니까?
skinshuffle.toasts.refused_reconnect.tit: 다른 플레이어는 바뀐 스킨을 보고 있지 않습니다.
skinshuffle.toasts.refused_reconnect.mes:
바뀐 스킨을 표시하기 위해 재접속이 필요합니다.
§7§o설정에서 이 화면을 숨길 수 있습니다.
skinshuffle.toasts.offline.title: 스킨 적용 불가
skinshuffle.toasts.offline.message:
인증이 만료되어 스킨을 적용할 수 없습니다.
§7§o설정에서 이 화면을 숨길 수 있습니다.
skinshuffle.toasts.editor_failure.title: 에디터에 문제가 생겨 작업을 실패했습니다.
skinshuffle.config.title: SkinShuffle
skinshuffle.config.popups.title: 팝업 설정
skinshuffle.config.popups.description: Configuration options regarding toasts and other popups that appear in-game in certain circumstances.
skinshuffle.config.popups.reconnect.name: 스킨 적용 경고 끄기
skinshuffle.config.popups.reconnect.desc:
Disable the toast that appears when you do not reconnect after changing your skin.

This only shows on servers without the mod installed.
skinshuffle.config.general.title: 일반 설정
skinshuffle.config.general.description: General configuration options that change or toggle functionality.
skinshuffle.config.general.display.title: 표시
skinshuffle.config.general.disable_api.d:
Should SkinShuffle not upload your skin to the Mojang API?

If enabled, this will mean that your skin will not be visible to yourself or other players.
skinshuffle.config.general.display_title: Should the currently selected skin preset and the skin preset button be shown on the title screen?
skinshuffle.config.general.display_pause: Should the currently selected skin preset and the skin preset button be shown on the pause screen?
skinshuffle.config.general.carousel_scro: How sensitive should the carousel be to mouse scrolling?
skinshuffle.config.general.invert_carous: Should the carousel scroll direction be inverted?
skinshuffle.config.rendering.title: 렌더링 설정
skinshuffle.config.rendering.description: Configuration options regarding how skin presets are rendered in the title screen, pause menu, carousel and edit screens.
skinshuffle.config.rendering.render_play: Should SkinShuffle render player capes from Mojang, Optifine and Minecraft Capes providers?
skinshuffle.config.rendering.rendering_s:
§lROTATION§r rotates the rendered player at a fixed rate specified by the rotation speed multiplier.
§lCURSOR§r makes the rendered player look at the mouse cursor at all times, similarly to the inventory screen.
skinshuffle.config.rendering.carousel_re: How should the currently selected skin preset be rendered in the carousel screen?
skinshuffle.config.rendering.preset_edit: How should the skin preview be rendered in the preset edit screen?
skinshuffle.config.rendering.widget_rend: How should the widget on the title screen and pause screen be rendered?
skinshuffle.config.rendering.rotation_sp: What rotation speed multiplier should be applied to skins if rotation is enabled?
skinshuffle.carousel.title: 스킨 프리셋
skinshuffle.carousel.default_tooltip: §4기본 프리셋은 복사 및 설정을 할 수 없습니다.
skinshuffle.carousel.confirmations.delet:
이 프리셋 삭제를 원하시나요?
이 작업은 되돌릴수 없습니다!
skinshuffle.edit.customize.title: 프리셋 설정
skinshuffle.edit.source.invalid_username:
§4§nInvalid Username§r

Username must only contain a-Z 0-9.
Username may contain underscores.
Username must be between 3-16 characters long.
Username must exist.
skinshuffle.edit.source.invalid_file:
§4§nInvalid File§r

File must exist and must be in 
the §l.png§r format.
skinshuffle.edit.source.invalid_url:
§4§nInvalid URL§r

URL is invalid. Must be either a 
valid §lhttp§r or §lhttps§r URL.
skinshuffle.edit.source.invalid_uuid:
§4§nInvalid UUID§r

UUID must be in the following format:
§lxxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx
skinshuffle.edit.source.invalid_resource:
§4§nInvalid Resource Location§r

Resource location must be a valid
texture file that is loaded by the game.
skinshuffle.edit.source.title: 스킨 파일 위치
